name: e2i
description: e2i serves as a bridge between workers and employers, connecting with workers to offer job security through job-matching, career guidance and skills upgrading services, and partnering employers to address their manpower needs through recruitment, training and job redesign solutions. e2i is a tripartite initiative of the National Trades Union Congress set up to support nation-wide manpower and skills upgrading initiatives.
features: The Career Trial Programme is part of the suite of career services offered by Workforce Singapore (WSG) and e2i to strengthen the employability of locals, through a short-term stint with an employer
Providing One-Stop, Personalised Services for Your Manpower and Training Needs

e2i works with businesses to create customised professional development programmes which can range from one-off half day masterclasses to in-house training modules and week-long courses for their employees and other select participants.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Career Guidance for Singaporeans. Professional Development and Productivity Solutions for Companies. Connect with us!
ShortDescription: e2i is the empowering network for workers and employers seeking employment and employability solutions.

Highlights.name: Career Conversion Programmes
Highlights.description: Career Conversion Programmes (CCPs) are placement programmes targeted at mid-career switchers, to undergo skills conversion and move into new occupations or sectors that have good prospects and opportunities for progression. Trainees will undergo structured on-the-job training to transit into the new job role.

Highlights.name: Place and Train without Conversion Programmes
Highlights.description: Trainees will undergo structured on-the-job training of up to three months to be upskilled into their new job roles.  e2i works with our partners to develop such programmes to help address manpower shortages in many industries and to tackle skills-gaps among job seekers interested in taking on the available jobs.

Highlights.name: Professional Development Programmes
Highlights.description: e2i works with businesses to create customised professional development programmes which can range from one-off half day masterclasses to in-house training modules and week-long courses for their employees and other select participants.

enhanced_description: e2i is a tripartite initiative of the National Trades Union Congress, established in 2008 in Singapore, focused on supporting nation-wide manpower and skills upgrading initiatives. As an empowering network for workers and employers, e2i serves as a bridge, connecting workers with job security through job-matching, comprehensive career guidance, and skills upgrading services. For employers, e2i partners to address manpower needs via recruitment, training, and job redesign solutions. They offer one-stop, personalized services for manpower and training needs, including customized professional development programs such as masterclasses, in-house modules, and week-long courses. Key programs include the Career Trial Programme (in partnership with Workforce Singapore) for short-term stints, Career Conversion Programmes (CCPs) for mid-career switchers to undergo skills conversion and transition into new roles, and Place and Train programs to upskill trainees and address industry manpower shortages and skills gaps. The overarching goal is to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity.
key_use_cases: Upskilling employees for new job roles
Tackling skills gaps among job seekers
competitive_advantages: Tripartite initiative with national backing (National Trades Union Congress)
Provides a bridge between workers and employers
Offers one-stop, personalized services for manpower and training needs
Focus on strengthening employability of locals
